<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disarming Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=1613) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands. Make a melee Strike; if you hit, you can attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) that foe.
name: Disarming Assault
